action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) radiant damage.

action.name: Scintillating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 5 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.
